name: Cheetah
description:
Avoid lions, eat zebra's, find your cub! That is the gist of this colorful and animal-centered game played on the beautiful Savannah.

Give it a try!

A very short game, 5 different missions, will you find your cub in all of them?

Tip 1: Eat a zebra to restore health!

Tip 2: Sneak to avoid lions seeing you!

Background

This is my first game made. I would love to expend it, with more animals, more challenges, more varied scenery and expand to mobile. But before doing that, I need to understand a bit better if people like the concept.

Any feedback is very much appreciated! Thank you!
